review: I really liked it at first. The number of apps and games available makes it very appealing. The problem lies within video playback. Whether it's Netflix, Hulu, Plex... all of them are "choppy". I had mine connected to a high end Samsung and I could barely watch it because the videos weren't smooth. Cartoons aren't bad (so I moved it to my daughters room) but everything else is terrible. I bought it to replace a Chromecast (which plays perfect) mainly because I wanted a remote. I tried the 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz bands and neither made a difference (my internet is 30 down and 5 up, so it's plenty). Maybe I got a faulty device, or maybe it's just not capable of streaming. Either way, it wasn't a complete waste of money and the price isn't bad, but I can't say I would recommend it.
